website_summaries.verdict: Very inexpensive multivitamin supplement that works for dogs of all ages to help with overall health.
pros: Can be used daily for improved overall health
Product is manufactured in the United States, so you can count on the quality
Most dogs like the taste of these chewable vitamins
cons: Vitamins have an odor that humans probably won't like
Hard chewable tablet that's tough for dogs with sore teeth

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for giving my dogs a longer life.
customer_reviews.text: Just put to sleep my 16yr old Golden Retriever due to a stroke. He was given these vitamins his whole life. I know the vitamins have something to do with his long loving life because his brother from the same litter passed away 7 months earlier. My vet is amazed at the long life they had and told me it's was due to the care and nutrition I gave them. I have not received any product or compensation for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Mission accomplished with a cheap vitamine
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try vitamins for our dogs to see if they would quit eating you-know-what in our back yard. But their just dogs, so I didn't want to spend a ton of money. These were cheap and had lots of vitamins, but they smelled nasty when I opened them up. Kind of like vitamins did when I was a kid. BUT...even though they are basic, hard, vitamin pills, our dogs love and scarf them right down. They *seem* to have done the job, so mission accomplished with minimal expense, and I'll keep buying them.
customer_reviews.author: W Bee

customer_reviews.title: Dog gobbles these up.
customer_reviews.text: I cook my Havanese puppy's food from scratch. The vet said that was fine, but that I needed to add vitamins to her daily routine. I took a chance on these, figuring if she didn't like them at least they were not too expensive. She loves these. I break them into four pieces and give them to her at breakfast as if they were treats. She gobbles them up and then licks off the powder residue from the floor. Will keep ordering these.
customer_reviews.author: Bostonmama

customer_reviews.title: The dog is very happy and healthy and I have added their skin formula ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for a couple of years because I make my own dog food and these are as close to the NRC (like the RDA for dogs) requirements as any I could find. The dog is very happy and healthy and I have added their skin formula as well (red nose) and it has cleared up her skin problems too.
customer_reviews.author: H. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Dogs will not eat them.
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs (Golden and GSD) each about six. Generally they eat everything. Unfortunately, when we offer these they walk away. We purchased another highly rated vitamin off Amazon and they gobble it down. The Pro-Sense May be a great multivitamin but if the dog will not eat it the value is zero. These Pro-Sense do bear an uncanny/identical resemblance to a Walmart dog vitamin we tried once. Same gray colored hard discs. Our dogs refused to eat those as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a great supplement to the homemade dog food we give our dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: We noticed a significant difference in our 2 dogs after ...
customer_reviews.text: We noticed a significant difference in our 2 dogs after giving them these vitamins. One was recovering from a sever case of mange and a month after starting these vitamins the improvement was significant. The other older dog is not a fan but we have noticed his energy levels increasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Reece

customer_reviews.title: Two happy customers
customer_reviews.text: I make our dogs’ food and read that homemade food may lack enough vitamins and minerals for their diet. I was concerned, especially since one is getting up there in age. This multi-vitamin is pretty well-reviewed across multiple sites. The pups act like the vitamins are like treats. The coat of my older dog has improved over time (the other one is younger with a naturally amazing coat with no adverse changes). They haven’t had any bad reactions, and the older one also has a bunch of skin conditions that haven’t been aggravated by these pills. Overall, I recommend them, as do these two.
customer_reviews.author: A&G

customer_reviews.title: POISONOUS!! DANGEROUS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT BUY THESE!! They may be inexpensive but I personally think they’re poisonous!!! I’ve given these to my dog (who wouldn’t eat them unless In peanut butter) and he has been PISSING BLOOD. THIS IS THE ONLY CHANGE TO HIS DIET. PLEASE do NOT BUY THESE. I’m throwing them away NOW. Terrible product. I will spend $20 on vitamins for them now. I’ve learned my lesson. These are poisonous. DANGEROUS FOR YOUR DOG!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: *******  They DO Work.  *******
customer_reviews.text: I felt my 9 year old Shih Tzu was a bit sluggish. Figured it couldn't hurt to try vitamins. In less than two weeks there was a noticeable difference in the degree of his activity. He was running, and playing more often. Seemed a little sharper mentally. And overall just more frisky and playful. I will buy this again and keep it as a regular part of his diet. Ranger says, "Woof".
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Baby and Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product with my dogs for a few years and I'm very happy with the results. Actually I found my Shepherd I cut back on his a little because of all the energy he was very high energy. I have since (60 LB ) dog and have found that four tabs is plenty for him.
customer_reviews.author: JanT

customer_reviews.title: High in vitamin A which is found in animal organ meats.
customer_reviews.text: You get a really good deal for this product. You can’t beat this price. Unfortunately, it is called a multivitamin but if you look at the percentages everything is low except for vitamin a. Vitamin a is found in animal organs which is very important for dogs but I wish the other vitamins has a higher percentage. I can’t argue about the price but I wish they would market this differently. I will be supplementing with other multivitamins in addition to this.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: the number of tablets varies per bottle
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a better rating because my dogs like the flavor and I have no trouble getting them to take it. What I don't like is that there is not always 90 tablets as stated on the label of the bottle. The last bottle I received had only 40 tablets in a sealed bottle, not 90 as advertised. Whoever packages these tablets can't count to 90.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa J.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful company to order from tho
customer_reviews.text: My dog will NOT take these at all.So will give to friend for her dog & see what happens.Don't know what I'm going to do now.This is fourth one I've tried & he will not eat any of the brands I've bought.Not even liquid.Wonderful company to order from tho.THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: ABD

customer_reviews.title: Please read full review and use discretion....
customer_reviews.text: I will not be ever purchasing again and buyer please be ware....have tried twice now but two out of three pups got sick. Sadly really wanted this product to be good for we have pups that have the need for these and we'll back to the drawing board we go. Great price and for the amount even better but unless you want to clean up vomit and yes we even tried with food and without food and as I stated 2 out of 3 pups got sick I would not recommend. First bottle our oldest did good but second go neither bottles did good.
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: Grind them up into a powder and mix into dog food--a treat they are not -- taste terrible
customer_reviews.text: I suggest grinding the tablets up in the food processor into a fine powder. Then sprinkle it in their food --be sure to add a bit of wet food to the dry food and it mixes in undetected by doggy tastebuds. I have 2 small dogs 9 pounds each and I mix a heaping teaspoon into their food. Other wise they will not eat them as a whole pill. Sniff a bit and then walk away. I tried peanut butter on then--putting them inside a chuck of cheese. No go. They must taste really terrible. Would you want to chew on your multivitamin? I tried it on mine--yuck! Otherwise they contain good ingredients for just an all purpose vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Dogs LOVE them.
customer_reviews.text: All I have to do is shake the bottle and my dogs come running to get their vitamin. I am a dog breeder and have used these for years. My dogs are healthy and have healthy fat pups.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Garcia

customer_reviews.title: My picky eater loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very hard time giving my dog supplements because she is so picky. But she seems to love these vitamins, and always readily eats them. This is unusual for her as she has been known to turn her nose up to such dog delicacies as hamburger and even pizza! These vitamins are complete and balanced, and I feel better knowing she has taken one when she hasn't eaten all of her dinner.
customer_reviews.author: SHS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 year old Coonhound-Wolf Mix and I noticed that her health has been going downhill, especially after she just accidentally had a litter of 12 pups at the age of 11 years old. I decided to give her these vitamins just to see what would happen, and I must say she is back to her happy healthy self. She has gained back her weight, and has so much pep back in her step. I love that these are affordable and Annie girl loves them. I will be keeping my girl on these vitamins, and I am now going to give my other dogs these as well. A++ I love the fact that they've helped my rescue girl!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Queen

customer_reviews.title: Yeast is the Number One Ingredient!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my dog and it seemed to help as he was a puppy who liked to eat rocks. The suggestion was that he might be vitamin deficient. It worked...no more eating rocks...but I also gave to my other dog who developed a $160 yeast infection in his ears. Steer clear of this unless you want a yeasty dog!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on Amazon for doggo vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I have two English Bulldogs and have been able to see positive results in teeth, coat, eyes, and nails. Good value, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: irooster

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 13 years old and has kidney disease. She is on medication for bladder control, as well as taking fish oil daily. We also have been making her food for her, instead of a prescription diet or continuing her Pedigree dog food. To ensure she is getting the nutrition she needs, we started giving her these multivitamins. I wouldn't say I have noticed a difference in her health, but they definitely don't hurt. I will say that her kidney levels haven't increased since taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what scent is in these that the dogs don't like but one of my dogs will not eat them at all and one has no problem chewing them up and eating them just fine. He is doing really good since he's been taking them. I have been noticing better breath so idk if it's because of the enzymes or the vitamins but either way it's working. He also isn't whining anymore at night. I'm glad I found these and they are relatively inexpensive which is nice. I'll be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kaltech09

customer_reviews.title: Very effective vitamin
customer_reviews.text: We have been offering these vitamins to our 4 dogs for almost one year and we are very satisfied. We were not too concerned about flavor because our terriers would eat rocks if you put some sauce on them, but out main concern was the bio availability of the components, and in this particular aspect this vitamin seems to rock. Recently one of our dogs made a full blood panel test and everything was perfect which leads us to conclude that a decent diet (we feed BARF) associated with these vitamins have been doing wonders for our pooches.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Gave my old dog energy
customer_reviews.text: I have an older dog that's really seeing benefits from this vitamin. I've been giving this to her for a couple weeks now and we are finishing up the first bottle between her and my younger dog. She's having much more energy than before and doesn't mind the flavor of these at all. My younger dog doesn't even chew them so I guess he wouldn't have an opinion on the flavor. Both dogs like them and I believe they are heathier from taking these vitamins. It is actually good to see my old dog have more energy, so I'm going to keep giving them to her.
customer_reviews.author: Cat LadyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great results for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am currently on my third bottle of these vitamins for my 8 year old border collie and I can see the difference it has made. My dog has more energy and his coat it a lot clearer and healthier as well. My dog also enjoys to eat them, while other brands had to be hidden in food in order for him to take them. The price is also great for the results they provide.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Guevarra

customer_reviews.title: Dogs eat them by themselves.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are picky and I didn't even know when buying these dog vitamins that they are flavored. I thought they would be tiny pills and are in a large container and look like round dog biscuits, both my 16 year old lab and 5 year old mini aussie ate them, my aussie you could tell knew something was up and want a biscuit, but he did eat it. Great value and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: rotwiler

customer_reviews.title: Their Okay
customer_reviews.text: First off the bottle is huge, much bigger than i expected for the price. Now my dog does not actually like the taste, so i have to chop up each pill and mix into her food. Since these are SO hard, i cant just crumble them, they have to be chopped, which is kind of a pain each time. So overall these are simply Okay.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great treats
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they are doing any good as far as vitamins or potency goes, but my 3 of my dogs love these and think they are treats. One of my dogs is not as excited, she will eat it, but not until later or if she thinks another dog is going to steal it from her. I have bought many bottles so far and will continue to.
customer_reviews.author: fwa

customer_reviews.title: Not appetizing
customer_reviews.text: This supplement seems to be working, my dog isn't eating bugs like she was, but the large size and bad taste, make it difficult to feed to my dog. My dog will eat almost anything, specially bugs like grasshoppers, but she will not eat these supplements. Also the pills are very hard which make it difficult to grind up in her food.
customer_reviews.author: drashlene

customer_reviews.title: Crush and mix
customer_reviews.text: My picky pooch required a crushed. ( 1/2) vitamin and added to some meat drippings I had saved but fooled her ;) Hopefully this will help due to her gradual refusal to eat ANY type of dog food and help maintain her weight and health as she continues to age ( now 7) People foods ( healthy meats) only now! She's the boss after losing way to much weight. I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: A Rose

customer_reviews.title: Made our dog sick
customer_reviews.text: My mom gave her dog one in the morning, around lunch time she was throwing up, could of been a coincidence but as of now we are not giving them to our dogs
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Made dog sick evidently
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work somewhat, but started making my dog sick after a week...
customer_reviews.author: Black

customer_reviews.title: No sugar keto for dogs lol.
customer_reviews.text: Totally trust worthy and great product. My dogs love it they think they are treats. I put them in there toys and they try to get them out. So win win. They tired themselves out and peace and quite for me. Lol. The ingredients are good to. No sugar.
customer_reviews.author: spirit lifter

customer_reviews.title: Helped my old dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16 year old dachshund that recently started eating his fences and I tried all kinds of different supplements that were supposed to make him stop and none of them would work. The vet told me last option was a possibly a vitamin deficiency. So I looked around and found this and after only two days on this vitamin supplement he stopped. So I am very happy and will continue to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K.

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs of varying sizes, breeds and ages. They all get one of these with their dinner each night and I’ve seen wonderful improvements in all of them for it. I used to buy this item at a box store but it became unavailable and it was also 3-4x more expensive there as well. I will continue buying this product from Amazon as their price can’t be beat and my animals are doing great with these vitamins ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Malador loves it and the price is very reasonable. I give it to him daily as a "treat" and he gobbles it up. He even sits and high fives for it every time I grab the bottle so he must enjoy it. When I first rescued him, he had a very dull coat but after a few weeks on this stuff, it's become smooth and shiny. He's also stopped shedding as much so I'd definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Dog
customer_reviews.text: I started giving this vitamin to my Great Pyrenees several years ago. She is now 10 years old and doesn't look her age. I don't know for sure what effect this vitamin has had, but she doesn't act like an older dog and has been very healthy. She is a fussy eater and I have to break up the vitamins and put them in with her food, but she eats them that way fine.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Dogs don’t recognize them as a treat or food or even something edible.
customer_reviews.text: I have one dog that will eat almost anything ( except onions, oranges, and hot peppers) and he looked at these like I was giving him a rock to eat! My other dog is pickier. Both of them sniffed them and looked at me with WTH faces.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Baker

customer_reviews.title: 🥺
customer_reviews.text: Both of my baby get diarrhea b eating this vitamin
customer_reviews.author: allisonlovebeauty3

customer_reviews.title: The greatest deal ever
customer_reviews.text: The dog's loved them, I thought I might have a problem with getting the dog's to eat them , but I didn't even have to hide them in their food,I just gave it directly to them as a treat and they devoured them.it made them happy, I'll have to let you know about the long term effects are ,but the price is incredible. I thought it was a misprint.
customer_reviews.author: brian watson

customer_reviews.title: Like A Puppy Again
customer_reviews.text: 14 year Wheaten mix was just kind of going through the motions. Didn't get excited about much. Gave him these last month , and in less than a week, he's like a puppy again. Started giving 1/2 chewable for 25 lb dog, and was so surprised. He gobbles right down, smells kinda like beef bouillon. Anyway, this is my 2nd so we don't run out.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Upset my Husky's tummy!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product for three days. Unfortunately, I work evenings so my 75lb. Husky is home alone in the evening for several hours, I came home to a diarrhea explosion all three mornings. I am not sure if it's just too strong for him so I will try just a half a tablet but I have a feeling that may not make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: cool

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love!
customer_reviews.text: Although I am not sure on the flavor myself my dogs like them and have no problem taking them like they have other products that I have tried in the past! Great buy for the money too!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Taste earns zero stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog will not go NEAR these. I have to break it into FOUR pieces and hide each piece in a pill pocket...and even then it takes 20 minutes of coaxing. The price is amazing, hence the 2 stars. They have all the vitamins needed too. My dog is NOT picky either. If he would eat them I would give 5 stars hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Have been our dogs daily vitamins for years now
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple American bullies and they eat these fairly well, they love the taste. I use them just to keep my fur kids healthy because if I'm going to take vitamins and give them to my children Then my dogs take them also. I don't use them for anything except for health purposes and they are even safe for pregnant and lactating females
customer_reviews.author: Jose and Ashley Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: All my dogs seem to like the flavor of these and take them very well. The amount for the money is great anywhere else they are three to four times higher priced.
customer_reviews.author: Betty glass

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this product. I wanted to start giving my dog a daily vitamin she liked since she’s entering her senior-hood. When I saw the pill I thought there way she’d eat this. But for some reason, she loved it! She takes one a day and her overall health has improved amazing! She sleeps less during the day She’s more active and happy. It’s put a “pep” in her step. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky P

customer_reviews.title: My lady pit will not eat these.
customer_reviews.text: My lady pit will not eat these. Even if I hide them in food or snacks, she will eat everything else and spit these out or eat around them and not touch these vitamins. Can't really give a positive or negative review since there is no way for me to tell if they are beneficial or not. I just know I wont be buying these any more, unfortunately. Best of luck with your pup.
customer_reviews.author: Old Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Cruisen & the neighborhood dogs love this vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Can't see much difference between this & the Skin, Hair & Coat product also by Prosense but the Dogs love it & so, by the way, do the family cats. I'm an herbalist & always looking for a good alternative to chemical foreign made product for the puppies & pets in our lives. Will be buying this often & monthly for the waggy customers.
customer_reviews.author: J.G. Emrys, Compounding HerbalistTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal & the Dog likes them!
customer_reviews.text: Good multi Vitamins! For a rescue dog my mom adopted & 2 wks in~helping his appetite increase; his fur looks good and he just acts more spunky. Plus since he has been under lots of re homes before she adopted him; its good too know his nutritional requirements are being met...And He Happily eats these!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda123

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 Great Danes and a Doberman and I give them 2 of these each day along with a separate probiotic and they gobble them down like crazy. My vet says my dogs are perfectly healthy and said keep doing what your doing. The price on these are perfect and hey anything to keep my fur kids healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Joy R

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, my GS is a picky eater . In the morning he impatiently waits for me to get the bottle for his morning vitamins. I don’t know what’s in them, but the others I purchased I had to hide in his food or wrap in cheese to try and get him to swallow them. He would eat the bottle if I let him.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy ann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. The ingredients are excellent and quality. I’ve noticed more energy, softer shine coat, and happy babies. Can’t beat this price!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these! I don’t think they do anything for “pain?” I just read that part in the review and was surprised. Anywho, I bought these because I cook and use human food for my dogs. I wanted to make sure they are getting all the necessary vitamins. I’ve ordered them several times.
customer_reviews.author: ~ Luvs2ShopAlot ~

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste but seems to be working.
customer_reviews.text: So.. their are a Huge amount of benefits to this. It's practically a dog vitamin and I'm all for that. Although, my dogs don't like the taste and smell of them at all. I take a small amount of peanut butter and put it on the vitamin and then they will take it. The tablets break in half which is nice because my pups are little. I haven't seen much change but my older pup (13) seems to have more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Branch

customer_reviews.title: Dog approves.
customer_reviews.text: Got for my APBT, she eats them like a treat, no problem. Coat looks shiny and no complaints. I have bought these a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Listen to your pet; don't force it by hiding it in the food
customer_reviews.text: Husky eventually stopped eating it. Our Australian Shepherd was having gas. Maybe it would have worked for other pets, but not ours. I don't believe in hiding their pill in their dog food, as this has caused one or both of them worse problems. My husky especially knows what his body needs, despite our older dog who needs more nutrients but will eat anything -- even whatever is in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: dan bevis

customer_reviews.title: He actually eats this one!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has never eaten a vitamin without it being disguised in food or crushed being crushed. This vitamin has been gobbled up everytime. This is huge for my very picky eater. The benefits of taking the vitamin are yet to be seen, but we are off to a good start.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Russo

customer_reviews.title: good price for big quantity
customer_reviews.text: pros: *it is a lot for good price. *our dog take it and eat it. *it doesn’t have bad smell for us. *doesn’t show any bad side effect. cons: *doesn’t see good effect too yet. (bought a three bottle of this and will update this review if any result after few months.)
customer_reviews.author: Abes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hoping these vitamins, along with salmon oil, will help with excessive shedding🤞
customer_reviews.author: Veronica L. Betancourtcantu

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: Assuming it's everything it says it is it's a great value especially when you have a lot of dogs. I've been using it for about a year now and while the dogs don't like to eat it I just crumble it up easily enough with their kibble. All dogs are healthy so I guess that's a good sign
customer_reviews.author: MrRobot

customer_reviews.title: So good so far
customer_reviews.text: My dog checked them out with nose and then licked it then bit it. I wasn't sure if she would chew and swallow but once she got it chewed she seemed to like it more. So after day 4 now I can say she likes them and gives me no problem taking her dose. Will update later to see how it affects her. So far no diarrhea or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Quan

customer_reviews.title: Gobbled up with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.text: First time ever our boy gobbled down a vitamin. Chewing it like a treat . Amazing I'll update later on digestion so far so good. My one complaint is I wish these were made for small doggies in mind. Cutting vitamins in quarters isn't much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Almost Live Fan

customer_reviews.title: Senior Life
customer_reviews.text: Have been giving my two senior (age 17) hounds and my young hound (age 5) this vitamin for at least 6 plus months..they all seems to be really healthy..they eat, sleep and poop exceptionally well..anything to keep them moving and a shaking.
customer_reviews.author: P. L. Mcclain

customer_reviews.title: Dogs hate the flavor/taste!
customer_reviews.text: My bubbies (dogs) absolutely hate the taste of it. It’s also a very large capsule, so I have to cut it in 1/2 to make it easier for them. If I sneak it in canned dog food they don’t notice it, but it’s pretty annoying to do that everyday with 3 dogs especially making sure each of them get their dose. Would not buy again due to the hassle of getting it down.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Way too large! You can’t even break it! I have to break it with a meat hammer! Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Cusa

customer_reviews.title: similar to more expensive
customer_reviews.text: I jumped on these after seeing the label. The ingredients are nearly exact to the vitamins i had been giving my dogs and it's 1/5th the price. Dogs don't like them, but i just shove them in a treat and down the gullet they go.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I have two four month old puppies, one likes to eat the you know what. These vitamins seem to help her not eat her you know what. They love these vitamins and think they are treats. Highly recommend and it is helping her not East her you know what. 😳
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to chew for small dogs. Very hard pills.
customer_reviews.text: To hard for small dogs. Have to break in half grind into fine powder then mix into dog food. I purchased 2 bottles will last for years doing it this way. Even 1/2 a pill is to large for our 8 pound dog hard as a rock to chew.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying from here now
customer_reviews.text: As far as I know it is the same product. Very good value for my money. I will definitely be buying from here instead. They are $4.98 at walmart per bottle. I got 2 bottles and it was still cheaper than 1 bottle from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Super price for a reliable product.
customer_reviews.text: My Dogs love them and I feel good about making sure they have their vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are thick and pretty big, I was a little worried about giving them to my dog but thankfully she was smart and broke it up. Havent noticed any tummy issues and Any vitamins are better than nothing so Im happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julia D.

customer_reviews.title: TIP: dip with peanut butter if needed
customer_reviews.text: Title. These work great for me, but there’s a tip for those whose dogs are pickier. My dog will eat them plain after a couple sniffs, but if I really want to make it a treat, I put a little bit of PB on it. So far so good, I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SMALL DOGS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my three dogs. I have 2 Dachshunds and a Chihuahua. These MultiVitamins are way to big for my dogs to benefit. I have to give them away. Sad for me because not all size dogs can chew these.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie G. Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Great “bite-a-mins”!
customer_reviews.text: My big girl is 13 and she loves her new “bite-a-mins”! Obviously the taste is great because she jumps up to East then quickly at the word. The ingredients seem sound and the vitamin recommended doses are just right, even for Senior dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette B

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves taking his vitamins every morning. These are great quality, he has a sensitive stomach and we have had no Issues. He has taken it for about 2 months now and we are definitely satisfied. How can you beat the price?! Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aoneil

customer_reviews.title: Super value!! I bought three bottles but I can't tell you what they taste like
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how a human can't judge the flavor but the price was unbelievable again driver took the package to the wrong address friendly neighbors had to bring them to me he took a picture but it sure wasn't my place
customer_reviews.author: Barry McGill

customer_reviews.title: My dogs think these are treats
customer_reviews.text: Both my dogs eat these vitamins without complaints. The pills can be snapped in half of you need to adjust dosage based on their weight. I have noticed an increase in energy in my dogs since they’ve begun to take them, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: VITAMIN
customer_reviews.text: SOME OF THE PILLS ARE VERY CRUMBLY AND THEY DONT HAVE THE BEST SMELL AND A LOT OF POWDER IN THE BOTTOM OT THE BOTTLE WHEN GETTING CLOSE TO FINISHED BUT THEY DO LIKE THEM GOOD VALUE FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Sabia

customer_reviews.title: My 10 lb dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I cut a pill in half because of his weigh. He eats it right down with no problem. I believe it is helping with hair loss. before I had hair all over my house but now I have a little but no where as much.
customer_reviews.author: Bettyboop

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I have used this for years with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have used this for years with my dog. I was so happy to see that you sell it too. Now, I don't have to go anywhere to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Dog vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I have several dogs and they love these vitamins. I don't have to hide it In peanut butter etc. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Turds > vitamins
customer_reviews.text: My dog is not impressed with the flavor or smell. Not sure why when she happily eats bugs and the occasional turd. Can't tell if they help with nutrition but at least I feel better about giving her a boost.
customer_reviews.author: S. Goldagi

customer_reviews.title: Try another brand.
customer_reviews.text: Over time these vitamins seem to smell bad. I will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Wade B

customer_reviews.title: My Yorkie thinks they are treats!
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to like theses as she thinks they are treats! Reasonable priced and I think , good quality. This is my 2nd bottle.
customer_reviews.author: lkzg

customer_reviews.title: Upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my year old mini schnauzer. I chose this because of the B vitamins. I’ve read that dogs who eat their feces are lacking B’s. Unfortunately they make him vomit each time I’ve given.
customer_reviews.author: S Sandstrom

customer_reviews.title: Finicky dog approves
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a very picky eater, but he downs these without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Maldonado Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Vitamins For My Picky Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My Great Dane and Corgi mix who are both picky eaters take these with ease. It seems to have slowed their shedding down. But I'm not sure the vitamins alone is the reason. But for the price, they could use the extra vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: leslie warner

customer_reviews.title: Dog wil not eat them straight from the bottle.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs will not eat the pills. I don't want the fuss of putting peanut butter on them every day.
customer_reviews.author: TexasTen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my dogs. They wouldn't take it. So, I did what I used to do when my children were younger and wouldn't take their meds.... I crushed them up and put it in their food. They gobbled it all up. Mission accomplished!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs look forward to their “treat” each day. No issues with any allergy so far. Love that this is inexpensive and that the dogs love it. I have 2 Boston terriers
customer_reviews.author: AXXR

customer_reviews.title: value and quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price; for I have bought them before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 bottles of vitamins when I got them half of them were broken and at the bottom of the container was nothing but powder. I will not buy vitamins through the mail anymore
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Dobay

customer_reviews.title: Great Multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: Product is very good for my dogs. I have previous ordered this item from Amazon. Never had any issues. But the one I just received had lots of broken tablets. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my dogs healthy
customer_reviews.text: My dogs look forward to their pills every morning, really noticed a shine to his hair! Been using it for over a year! Digestiveable !
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Bryan

customer_reviews.title: My dogs really enjoy these vitamins.
customer_reviews.text: Not that beagles are picky, mind you, they really like this vitamin! They look forward to it. They sit quite beautifully awaiting their daily multivitamin. Numerous benefits shall allow me to keep them healthy and part of my life for a while. Best part I do not have to tackle them, or force them to take their vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: GGA

customer_reviews.title: One dog liked them the other didn't
customer_reviews.text: One dog liked them the other didn't, so three stars for flavor but 5 for value.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. My 65 # dog likes but my Pomeranian stopped liking it. I think it may have been too hard for her. It's now out of stock so I have to find another one.
customer_reviews.author: Moxy_mcl

customer_reviews.title: She likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is so picky on what she eats, I have purchased so many vitamins and treats trying to find something she won't turn her nose to. I was worried she would not eat these as well. But, as soon as I handed her the first vitamin, she ate it. I was so surprised that she likes it! I also received my products early and the price was amazing! Thank you! I am thinking about reordering already because to find something she likes, I stock up on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ProSense Multivitamin for All Life Stages, 90-Count
product_meta.description: Color:Original VersionPro·Sense brand offers a variety of proactive, sensible solutions for all of your pet’s healthcare and wellness needs. Easily shop our solution-based segments to develop the best healthcare plan for your companion. We know pet parenting can be tough, which is why we’ve improved our ingredients and benefits to make it easier than ever to care for them like any other member of your family. Pro·Sense healthcare and wellness products will help you proactively invest in your pet’s health by providing the proper vitamins, supplements and topicals they need. Pro-Sense Multivitamin is appropriate for all life stages. Give your pup this vitamin tablet to help support their overall wellness. 90 chewable tablets give your plenty to last when creating a daily health routine. See back label for feeding instructions with amounts from 1/2 to 2 full tablets. Take a proactive approach to your pet's overall wellness by adding a Dental Solution to your routine.
feature_bullets: Suitable for everyday use when used as directed
